tool_description: Analyzes temporal trends in review data including rating changes over time, review volume patterns, and seasonal variations.

review_ids.description: List of review IDs with timestamp data

time_granularity.description: Time bucket granularity: day, week, month, quarter

metrics.description: Metrics to analyze: rating, volume, sentiment

moving_average_window.description: Window size for moving average calculation

detect_seasonality.description: Whether to detect seasonal patterns in the data

min_reviews_per_period.description: Minimum reviews required per time period for analysis

error_messages: Empty review data: review_ids array cannot be empty
Invalid time granularity: Use one of [day, week, month, quarter]
Invalid metrics: Use combination of [rating, volume, sentiment]
Invalid moving average window: Must be a positive integer less than total periods
Insufficient temporal data: Need data spanning multiple time periods for trend analysis
Invalid minimum threshold: min_reviews_per_period must be a positive integer
usage: Provide review IDs with timestamps and specify analysis parameters like time granularity and metrics. Returns trend data and statistical summaries over time.

time_periods.description: Time period labels for the analysis

trend_values.description: Trend values for each time period

moving_averages.description: Moving average values for trend smoothing

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: increasing, decreasing, stable

seasonality_detected.description: Whether seasonal patterns were found in the data
